arabicText: وَإِذَا حُيِّيتُم بِتَحِيَّةٍۢ فَحَيُّوا۟ بِأَحْسَنَ مِنْهَآ أَوْ رُدُّوهَآ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ حَسِيبًا
englishTranslationText:
And	when	you	are	greeted	with	some	words,	greet	back	with	words	better	than	it	or	with	the	
same;	indeed	Allah will	take	account	of	everything.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	tumheiñ	koi	kisi	lafz	se	Salām	kare	to	tum	us	se	behtar	lafz	jawāb	meiñ	kaho	ya	wohi	
kah	do	beshak	Allah	har	cheez	par	hisāb	lene	wāla	hai.

arabicText: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ لَيَجْمَعَنَّكُمْ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهِ ۗ وَمَنْ أَصْدَقُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ حَدِيثًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Allah!	 There	 is	 none	 worthy	 of	 worship	
except	Him;	He	will	 surely	gather	 you	all	
on	the	Day	of	Resurrection	in	which	there	
is	 no	 doubt;	 and	 whose	Words	 are	 more	
true	 than	 those	 of	 Allah?	(Allah does	 not	
lie.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	hai	ke	uske	siwā	kisi	ki	bandagi	nahi	
aur	woh	zaroor	tumheiñ	ikhat-tha	karega	
Qayāmat	 ke	 din	 jis	 meiñ	 kuch	 shak	 nahi	
aur	Allah	se	ziyāda	kis	ki	bāt	sachchi.

arabicText: ۞ فَمَا لَكُمْ فِى ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ فِئَتَيْنِ وَٱللَّهُ أَرْكَسَهُم بِمَا كَسَبُوٓا۟ ۚ أَتُرِيدُونَ أَن تَهْدُوا۟ مَنْ أَضَلَّ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُۥ سَبِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
So	 what	 is	 the	 matter	 with	 you	 that	 you	
got	 divided	 into	 two	 groups	 concerning	
the	 hypocrites,	 whereas	 Allah has	
inverted	them	because	of	their	misdeeds?	
Do	you	wish	to	guide	one	whom	Allah has	
sent	 astray?	 And	 for	 one	 whom	 Allah
sends	astray,	you	will	not find	a	way.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 tumheiñ	 kiya	 huwa	 ke	 munāfiqoñ	 ke	
bāre	meiñ	do	fareeq	ho	gaye	aur	Allah	ne	
unheiñ	 auñdha	 kar	 diya	 un	 ke	 kotakoñ	
(Bure	A'amal)	ke	sabab	kya	 ye	chāhte	ho	
ke	 usey	 rāh	 dikhāo	 jise	 Allah	 ne	 gumrāh	
kiya	aur	jise	Allah	gumrah	 kare	 to	hargiz	
tu	uske	liye	koi	rāh	na	pāye	ga.

arabicText: وَدُّوا۟ لَوْ تَكْفُرُونَ كَمَا كَفَرُوا۟ فَتَكُونُونَ سَوَآءًۭ ۖ فَلَا تَتَّخِذُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ أَوْلِيَآءَ حَتَّىٰ يُهَاجِرُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَخُذُوهُمْ وَٱقْتُلُوهُمْ حَيْثُ وَجَدتُّمُوهُمْ ۖ وَلَا تَتَّخِذُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ وَلِيًّۭا وَلَا نَصِيرًا
englishTranslationText:
They	 wish	 that	 you	 too	 should	 turn	
disbelievers	the	way	they	did,	so	that	you	
all	may	become	equal	- so	do	not	befriend	
any	 of	 them	 until	 they	 forsake	 their	
homes	and	 families	in	Allah’s	cause;	 then	
if	they	turn	back,	seize	them	and	kill	them
wherever	you	 find	 them;	and	do	not	 take	
any	of	them	as	a	friend	nor	as	a	supporter.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	 jo	 yeh	 chāhte	 haiñ	 ke	 kaheeñ	 tum	
bhi	 kāfir	 ho	 jāo	 jaise	 woh	 kāfir	 huwe	 to	
tum	 sab	 ek	 se	 ho	 jāo	 to un	 meiñ	 kisi	 ko	
apna	 dost	 na	 banāo	 jab	 tak	 Allah	 ki	 rāh	
meiñ	ghar-bār	na	chordeiñ	phir	agar	woh	
muñh	phereiñ	to	unheiñ	pakrdo	aur	jahāñ	
pāo	qatl	karo	aur	un	meiñ	kisi	ko	na	dost	
thahrāo	na	madad-gār

arabicText: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ يَصِلُونَ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍۭ بَيْنَكُمْ وَبَيْنَهُم مِّيثَـٰقٌ أَوْ جَآءُوكُمْ حَصِرَتْ صُدُورُهُمْ أَن يُقَـٰتِلُوكُمْ أَوْ يُقَـٰتِلُوا۟ قَوْمَهُمْ ۚ وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَسَلَّطَهُمْ عَلَيْكُمْ فَلَقَـٰتَلُوكُمْ ۚ فَإِنِ ٱعْتَزَلُوكُمْ فَلَمْ يُقَـٰتِلُوكُمْ وَأَلْقَوْا۟ إِلَيْكُمُ ٱلسَّلَمَ فَمَا جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمْ عَلَيْهِمْ سَبِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Except	 those	 who	 are	 related	 to	 the	
people	between	whom	and	you	is	a	treaty,	
or	who	come	 to	 you	with	 their	hearts	no	
longer	 having	 the	 will	 to	 fight	 you	 or	 to	
fight	 their own	 people;	 had	 Allah willed,	
He	 would	 certainly	 have	 given	 them	
power	 over	 you	 so	 that	 they	would	 have	
surely	 fought	 you;	 then	if	 they	avoid	 you	
and	do	not	wage	war	against	you	and	make	an	offer	of	peace	- then	Allah has	not	kept	for	you	a	
way	against	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Magar	 woh	 jo	 aisi	 qaum	 se	 alāqa	
(Ta'alluq)	 rakhte	 haiñ	 ke	 tum	 meiñ	 un	
meiñ	mu‘āhda	hai	ya	tumhāre	pās	yuñ	āye	
ke	unke	diloñ	meiñ	sakat	 (Tāqat)	na	rahi	
ke	 tum	 se	ladeiñ	 ya	 apni	 qaum	 se	ladeiñ	
aur	Allah	chāhta	to	zaroor	unheiñ	tum	par	
qābu	 deta	 to	 woh	 beshak	 tum	 se	 lardte	
phir	agar	woh	tum	se	kināra	kareiñ	aur	na	
ladeiñ	aur	sulāh	ka	payām	dāleiñ	to	Allah	ne	tumheiñ	un	par	koi	rāh	na	rakhi

arabicText: سَتَجِدُونَ ءَاخَرِينَ يُرِيدُونَ أَن يَأْمَنُوكُمْ وَيَأْمَنُوا۟ قَوْمَهُمْ كُلَّ مَا رُدُّوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلْفِتْنَةِ أُرْكِسُوا۟ فِيهَا ۚ فَإِن لَّمْ يَعْتَزِلُوكُمْ وَيُلْقُوٓا۟ إِلَيْكُمُ ٱلسَّلَمَ وَيَكُفُّوٓا۟ أَيْدِيَهُمْ فَخُذُوهُمْ وَٱقْتُلُوهُمْ حَيْثُ ثَقِفْتُمُوهُمْ ۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكُمْ جَعَلْنَا لَكُمْ عَلَيْهِمْ سُلْطَـٰنًۭا مُّبِينًۭا
englishTranslationText:
. You	will	now	find	others	who	desire	that	they	should	be	safe	from	you	and	also	safe	from	their	
own	people;	whenever	their	people	turn	them	towards	war,	they	fall	headlong	into	it;	so	if	they	
do	not	avoid	(confronting)	you	nor	submit	an	offer	of	peace	nor	restrain	their	hands,	seize	them	
and	kill	them	wherever	you	find	them;	and	they	are	the	ones	against	whom	We	have	given	you	
clear	authority
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ab	kuch	aur	tum	aise	pāo	ge	jo	yeh	chāhte	haiñ	ke	tum	se	bhi	amān	meiñ	raheiñ	aur	apni	qaum	
se	bhi	amān	meiñ	raheiñ	jab	kabhi	un	ki	qaum	unheiñ	fasād	ki	taraf	phere	us	par	auñdhe	girte	
haiñ	 phir	 agar	 woh	 tum	 se	 kināra	 na	 kareiñ	 aur	 sulāh	 ki	 gardan	 na	 dāleiñ	 aur	 apne	 hāth	 na	
rokeiñ	 to	 unheiñ	 pakdo	aur	jahāñ	 pāo	 qatl	 karo	aur	 yeh	 haiñ	jin	 par	 ham	 ne	 tumheiñ	 sareeh	
(Khula)	ikhtiyār	diya

arabicText: وَمَا كَانَ لِمُؤْمِنٍ أَن يَقْتُلَ مُؤْمِنًا إِلَّا خَطَـًۭٔا ۚ وَمَن قَتَلَ مُؤْمِنًا خَطَـًۭٔا فَتَحْرِيرُ رَقَبَةٍۢ مُّؤْمِنَةٍۢ وَدِيَةٌۭ مُّسَلَّمَةٌ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن يَصَّدَّقُوا۟ ۚ فَإِن كَانَ مِن قَوْمٍ عَدُوٍّۢ لَّكُمْ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌۭ فَتَحْرِيرُ رَقَبَةٍۢ مُّؤْمِنَةٍۢ ۖ وَإِن كَانَ مِن قَوْمٍۭ بَيْنَكُمْ وَبَيْنَهُم مِّيثَـٰقٌۭ فَدِيَةٌۭ مُّسَلَّمَةٌ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ وَتَحْرِيرُ رَقَبَةٍۢ مُّؤْمِنَةٍۢ ۖ فَمَن لَّمْ يَجِدْ فَصِيَامُ شَهْرَيْنِ مُتَتَابِعَيْنِ تَوْبَةًۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
It	 is	 not	 rightful	 for	 a	 Muslim	 to	 kill	
another	 Muslim,	 unless	 it	 occurs	 by	
mistake;	and	the	one	who	mistakenly	kills	
a	Muslim	must	set	free	a	Muslim	slave	and	
pay	 blood-money	 to	 the	 family	 of	 the	
slain,	 except	 if	 they	 forego	 it;	 and	 if	 the	
victim	 is	 of	 a	 people	 who	 are	 hostile	 to	
you,	and	 the	killer	is	a	Muslim,	 then	only	
the	 setting	 free	 of	 a	 Muslim	 slave	 (is	
obligatory);	 and	 if	 the	 victim	 is	 from	 a	
people	between	whom	and	you	there	is	a	
treaty,	then	blood-money	must	be	paid	to	
his	family	and	the	setting	free	of	a	Muslim	
slave;	 therefore	 one	 who	 has	 no	 means	
must	 fast	 for	 two	 consecutive	 months;	
this	is	his	penance	before	Allah;	and	Allah
is	All	Knowing,	Wise
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Musalmānoñ	 ko	 nahi	 pahuñchta	 ke	
Musalman	 ka	 khoon	 kare	 magar	 hāth	
bahek	 kar	 aur	 jo	 kisi	 Musalman	 ka	 nadānista	 qatl	 kare	 us	 par	 ek	 mamlook	
Musalman	 (Muslim	 Ghulām)	 ka	 azād	
karna	 hai	 aur	 khoon	 bahā	 ke	maqtool	 ke	
logoñ	ko	sapurd	ki	jāye	magar	yeh	ke	woh	
mu'āf	kar	deiñ	phir	agar	woh	us	qaum	se	
ho	 jo	 tumhāri	 dushman	 hai	 aur	 khud	
Musalman	 hai	 to	 sirf	 ek	 mamlook	
Musalman	ka	azād	karna	aur	agar	woh	us	
qaum	 meiñ	 ho	 ke	 tum	 meiñ	 un	 meiñ	
mu‘āhda	hai	to	uske	logoñ	ko	khoon	bahā	
supurd	ki	jāye	aur	ek	Musalman	mamlook	
āzad	karna	to	jiska	hāth	na	pahuñche	woh	
lagātār	do	mahine	ke	roze	rakhe	yeh	Allah	
ke	yahāñ	us	ki	tauba	hai	aur	Allah	jān	ne	wāla	Hikmat	wāla	hai.

arabicText: وَمَن يَقْتُلْ مُؤْمِنًۭا مُّتَعَمِّدًۭا فَجَزَآؤُهُۥ جَهَنَّمُ خَـٰلِدًۭا فِيهَا وَغَضِبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَلَعَنَهُۥ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُۥ عَذَابًا عَظِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	whoever	slays	a	Muslim	on	purpose,	
his	reward	will	be	hell	- to	remain	in	it	for	
ages	- and	Allah has	wreaked	wrath	upon	
him	 and	 has	 cursed	 him	 and	 kept	
prepared	a	terrible	punishment	for	him.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jo	 koi	Musalman	 ko	jān	 boojh	 kar	 qatl	 kare	 to	 uska	 badla	Jahannam	 hai	 ke	muddatoñ	 us	
meiñ	rahe	aur	Allah	ne	us	par	ghazab	kiya	aur	us	par	la'nat	ki	aur	uske	liye	tayyār	rakha	badā	
‘azāb.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِذَا ضَرَبْتُمْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَتَبَيَّنُوا۟ وَلَا تَقُولُوا۟ لِمَنْ أَلْقَىٰٓ إِلَيْكُمُ ٱلسَّلَـٰمَ لَسْتَ مُؤْمِنًۭا تَبْتَغُونَ عَرَضَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا فَعِندَ ٱللَّهِ مَغَانِمُ كَثِيرَةٌۭ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ كُنتُم مِّن قَبْلُ فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْكُمْ فَتَبَيَّنُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	When	you	go	forth	
to	fight	in	holy	war,	make	a	proper	study,	
and	do	not	say	to	the	one	who	greets	you,	“You	are	not	a	Muslim,”	- you seek	the	means	of	this	
worldly	life;	so	with	Allah are	the	bounties	in	plenty;	you	too	were	like	this	before,	then	Allah
bestowed	 His	 favour	 on	 you,	 therefore	 you	 must	 make	 a	 proper	 study;	 indeed	 Allah knows	
whatever	you	do.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aey	Imān	wālo!	Jab	tum	Jihād	ko	chalo	to	tahqeeq	karlo	aur	jo	tumheiñ	Salām	kare	us	se	yeh	na	
kaho	 ke	 tu	 Masalmān	 nahi	 tum	 jeeti	 duniya	 ka	 asbāb	 chāhte	 ho	 to	 Allah	 ke	 pās	 bahuteri	
ghanimateiñ	 haiñ	 pahle	 tum	 bhi	 aise	 hi	 they	 phir	 Allah	 ne	 tum	 par	 ehsān	 kiya	 to	 tum	 par	
tahqeeq	karna	lāzim	hai	beshak	Allah	ko	tumhāre	kāmoñ	ki	khabar	hai.

arabicText: لَّا يَسْتَوِى ٱلْقَـٰعِدُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ غَيْرُ أُو۟لِى ٱلضَّرَرِ وَٱلْمُجَـٰهِدُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ ۚ فَضَّلَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُجَـٰهِدِينَ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ عَلَى ٱلْقَـٰعِدِينَ دَرَجَةًۭ ۚ وَكُلًّۭا وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ ۚ وَفَضَّلَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُجَـٰهِدِينَ عَلَى ٱلْقَـٰعِدِينَ أَجْرًا عَظِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
The	Muslims	who	stay	back	from	holy	war	
without	 proper	 excuse,	 are	 not	 equal	 to	
the	 Muslims	 who	 fight	 in	 Allah's	 cause	
with	 their	 wealth	 and	 lives;	 Allah has	
bestowed	 higher	 ranks	 to	 the	 warriors	
who	 strive	 with	 their	 wealth	 and	 lives,	
than	 those	 who	 stay	 back;	 and	Allah has	
promised	 good	 to	 all;	 and	 Allah has	
favoured	 the	 warriors	 upon	 those	 who	
stay	back,	with	a	great	reward.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Barābar	 nahi	 woh	 Musalman	 ke	 be-uzr	
Jihād	 se	 baith	 raheiñ	 aur	 woh	 ke	 Rāh-eKhuda	 meiñ	 apne	 māloñ	 aur	 jānoñ	 se	
Jihād	karte	haiñ	Allah	ne	apne	māloñ	aur	
jānoñ	 ke	 sāth	 jihād	 wāloñ	 ka	 darja	 baith	
ne	wāloñ	se	bada	kiya	aur	Allah	ne	sab	se	
bhalāi	 ka	 w'ada	 farmāya	 aur	 Allah	 ne	
Jihād	 wāloñ	 ko	 baith	 ne	 wāloñ	 par	 bade	
sawāb	se	fazilat	di	hai.

arabicText: دَرَجَـٰتٍۢ مِّنْهُ وَمَغْفِرَةًۭ وَرَحْمَةًۭ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورًۭا رَّحِيمًا
englishTranslationText:
Ranks	 (of	 honour)	 from	 Him, and	
forgiveness,	 and	 mercy;	 and	 Allah is	 Oft	
Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Uski	 taraf	 se	 darje	 aur	 bakhshish	 aur	
rahmat	 aur	 Allah	 bakhsh ne	 wāla	
maherbān	hai.

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ تَوَفَّىٰهُمُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ ظَالِمِىٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ قَالُوا۟ فِيمَ كُنتُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ كُنَّا مُسْتَضْعَفِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ قَالُوٓا۟ أَلَمْ تَكُنْ أَرْضُ ٱللَّهِ وَٰسِعَةًۭ فَتُهَاجِرُوا۟ فِيهَا ۚ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ مَأْوَىٰهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ ۖ وَسَآءَتْ مَصِيرًا
englishTranslationText:
The	 angels	 ask	 the	 people	 whose	 souls	
they	 remove	 while	 they	 were	 wronging	
themselves,	“What	were	you	engaged	in?”	
They	 reply,	 “We	 were	 powerless	 in	 the	
land”;	 the	 angels	 say,	 “Was	 Allah’s	 earth	
not	 spacious	 enough	 for	 you	 to	 have	
migrated	 in	 it?”	 The	 destination	 for	 such	
is	 hell;	 and	 a	 very	 wretched	 place	 to	
return
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	log	jinki	jān	Firishte	nikāl	 te	haiñ	is	
hāl	 meiñ	 ke	 woh	 apne	 upar	 zulm	 karte	
they	 un	 se	 Firishte	 kahte	 haiñ	 tum	 kāhe	
meiñ	 they	 kahte	 hain	 ke	 ham	 zameen	
meiñ	kamzor	they	kahte	haiñ	kiya	Allah	ki	
zameen	 kushādah	 na	 thi	 ke	 tum	 us	meiñ	
hijrat	karte	to	aisoñ	ka	thikāna	Jahannam	
hai	aur	bahut	buri	jagah	palatne	ki.

arabicText: إِلَّا ٱلْمُسْتَضْعَفِينَ مِنَ ٱلرِّجَالِ وَٱلنِّسَآءِ وَٱلْوِلْدَٰنِ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ حِيلَةًۭ وَلَا يَهْتَدُونَ سَبِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Except	 those	 who	 were	 forcibly	 subdued	
among	men,	and	the	women	and	children,	
unable	 to	 devise	 a	 plan	 and	 unaware	 of	
the	way.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Magar	 woh	 jo	 dabā	 liye	 gaye	 mard	 aur	
aurteiñ	 aur	 bachche	 jinheiñ	 na	 koi	
tadbeer	ban	pade	na	rāsta	jāneiñ.

arabicText: فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَعْفُوَ عَنْهُمْ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَفُوًّا غَفُورًۭا
englishTranslationText:
So	 for	 such,	 it	 is	 likely	 that	 Allah will	
pardon	 them;	 and	 Allah is	 Most	
Pardoning,	Oft	Forgiving.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 qareeb	 hai	 ke	 Allah	 aisoñ	 ko	 mu'āf	
farmāye	 aur	 Allah	 mu'āf	 farmāne	 wāla	
bakhsh	ne	wāla	hai.

arabicText: ۞ وَمَن يُهَاجِرْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ يَجِدْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُرَٰغَمًۭا كَثِيرًۭا وَسَعَةًۭ ۚ وَمَن يَخْرُجْ مِنۢ بَيْتِهِۦ مُهَاجِرًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ثُمَّ يُدْرِكْهُ ٱلْمَوْتُ فَقَدْ وَقَعَ أَجْرُهُۥ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورًۭا رَّحِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Whoever	 migrates	 for	 Allah's	 cause	 will	
find	much	 shelter	 and	 abundant	 capacity	
in	 the	 earth;	 and	 whoever	 leaves	 his	
home,	migrating	towards	Allah and	His	Noble	Messenger,	and	death	seizes	him,	his	reward	then	
lies	entrusted	with	Allah;	and	Allah is	Oft	Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jo	 Allah	 ki	 rāh	 meiñ	 ghar-bār	 chord	
kar	niklega	woh	zameen	meiñ	bahut	jagah	aur	gunjāish	pāyega	aur	jo	apne	ghar	se	nikla	Allaho-Rasool	ki	taraf	Hijrat	karta	phir	usey	maut	ne	ā liya	to	uska	sawāb	Allah	ke	zimme	par	ho	gaya	
aur	Allah bakhsh	ne	wāla	maherbān	hai.

arabicText: وَإِذَا ضَرَبْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَن تَقْصُرُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ إِنْ خِفْتُمْ أَن يَفْتِنَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ كَانُوا۟ لَكُمْ عَدُوًّۭا مُّبِينًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	when	you	travel	in	the	land,	it	is	no	sin	for	you	to	curtail	some	of	your	obligatory	prayers;	if	
you	fear	that	disbelievers	may	cause	you	harm;	undoubtedly	the	disbelievers	are	open	enemies	
to	you.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	tum	zameen	meiñ	safar	karo	 to	 tum	par	gunāh	nahi	ke	b'az	Namāzeiñ	Qasr	se	padho	
agar	 tumheiñ	 andesha	 ho	 ke	 kāfir	 tumheiñ	izā	 deñge	 beshak	 kuffar	 tumhāre	 khule	 dushman	
haiñ

arabicText: وَإِذَا كُنتَ فِيهِمْ فَأَقَمْتَ لَهُمُ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ فَلْتَقُمْ طَآئِفَةٌۭ مِّنْهُم مَّعَكَ وَلْيَأْخُذُوٓا۟ أَسْلِحَتَهُمْ فَإِذَا سَجَدُوا۟ فَلْيَكُونُوا۟ مِن وَرَآئِكُمْ وَلْتَأْتِ طَآئِفَةٌ أُخْرَىٰ لَمْ يُصَلُّوا۟ فَلْيُصَلُّوا۟ مَعَكَ وَلْيَأْخُذُوا۟ حِذْرَهُمْ وَأَسْلِحَتَهُمْ ۗ وَدَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَوْ تَغْفُلُونَ عَنْ أَسْلِحَتِكُمْ وَأَمْتِعَتِكُمْ فَيَمِيلُونَ عَلَيْكُم مَّيْلَةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ ۚ وَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ إِن كَانَ بِكُمْ أَذًۭى مِّن مَّطَرٍ أَوْ كُنتُم مَّرْضَىٰٓ أَن تَضَعُوٓا۟ أَسْلِحَتَكُمْ ۖ وَخُذُوا۟ حِذْرَكُمْ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَعَدَّ لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَذَابًۭا مُّهِينًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 when	 you	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	
Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	
him)	 are	 among	 them	 and	 lead	 them	 in	
prayer,	 only	 a	 group	 of	 them	 should	 be	
with	 you,	 and	 they	 must	 keep	 their	
weapons	 with	 them;	 so	 when	 they	 have	
performed	 their	prostrations	 they	should	
move	 away	 behind	 you;	 and	 the	 other	
group	 that	 had	 not	 prayed,	 must	 come
and	 offer	 prayers	 in	 your	 leadership,	
keeping	 their	 guard	 and	 weapons	 with	
them;	 the	 disbelievers	 wish	 that	 you	
neglect	your	arms	and	your	means	so	they	
may	 overpower	 you	with	 a	 single	 attack;	
it	is	no	sin	 for	you	to	lay	aside	your	arms	
due	 to	 rain	 or	 if	 you	 are	 sick;	 and	 keep	
your	 guard;	 undoubtedly	 Allah has	 kept	
prepared	a	disgraceful	punishment	for	the	
disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 aey	 Mahboob jab	 tum	 un	 meiñ	
tashreef	 farmā	 ho	 phir	Namāz	meiñ	 unki	
Imāmat	 karo	 to	 chāhiye	 ke	 un	 meiñ	 ek	
jam'at	 tumhāre	 sāth	 ho	 aur	 woh	 apne	
hathiyār	 liye	 raheiñ	 phir	 jab	 woh	 Sajda	
kar	leiñ	to	hat	kar	tum	se	peeche	ho	jāyeiñ	
aur	 ab	 doosri	 jam'at	 āye	 jo	 us	 waqt	 tak	
Namāz	 meiñ	 shareek	 na	 thi	 ab	 woh	
tumhāre	muqtadi	hoñ	aur	chāhiye	ke	apni	
panāh	 aur	 apne	 hathiyār	 liye	 raheiñ	
kāfiroñ	 ki	 tamanna	 hai	 ke	 kaheeñ	 tum	
apne	hathiyāroñ	aur	apne	asbāb	se	ghāfil	
ho	jāo	to	ek	dafa'	tum	par	jhuk	padeiñ	aur	
tum	par	muzāiqa	nahi	agar	tumheiñ	meñh	
(Barish)	 ke	 sabab	 takleef	 ho	 ya	 bimār	 ho	
ke	 apne	 hathiyār	 khol	 rakho	 aur	 apni	
panāh	 liye	 raho	 beshak	 Allah	 ne	 kāfiroñ	
ke	liye	khuwāri	(Zillat)	ka	‘azāb	tayyār	kar	
rakha	ha

arabicText: فَإِذَا قَضَيْتُمُ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ فَٱذْكُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قِيَـٰمًۭا وَقُعُودًۭا وَعَلَىٰ جُنُوبِكُمْ ۚ فَإِذَا ٱطْمَأْنَنتُمْ فَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ كَانَتْ عَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ كِتَـٰبًۭا مَّوْقُوتًۭا
englishTranslationText:
So	 when	 you	 have	 offered	 your	 prayers	
remember	 Allah while	 standing,	 sitting	
and	 reclining;	 and	 when	 you	 feel	 secure,	
offer	prayers	in	the	usual	manner;	indeed	
prayers	are	a	time	bound	obligatory	duty	
upon	the	Muslims.	.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	jab	 tum	Namāz	padh	chuko	 to	Allah	ki	 yād	karo	khade	aur	baithe	aur	karwatoñ	par	lete	
phir	jab	mutma‘in	ho	jāo	to	hasb-e-dastoor	Namāz	qāim	karo	beshak	Namāz	Musalmanoñ	par	
waqt	bāñdha	huwa	farz	hai.

arabicText: فَإِذَا قَضَيْتُمُ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ فَٱذْكُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قِيَـٰمًۭا وَقُعُودًۭا وَعَلَىٰ جُنُوبِكُمْ ۚ فَإِذَا ٱطْمَأْنَنتُمْ فَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ كَانَتْ عَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ كِتَـٰبًۭا مَّوْقُوتًۭا
englishTranslationText:
So	 when	 you	 have	 offered	 your	 prayers	
remember	 Allah while	 standing,	 sitting	
and	 reclining;	 and	 when	 you	 feel	 secure,	
offer	prayers	in	the	usual	manner;	indeed	
prayers	are	a	time	bound	obligatory	duty	
upon	the	Muslims.	.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	jab	 tum	Namāz	padh	chuko	 to	Allah	ki	 yād	karo	khade	aur	baithe	aur	karwatoñ	par	lete	
phir	jab	mutma‘in	ho	jāo	to	hasb-e-dastoor	Namāz	qāim	karo	beshak	Namāz	Musalmanoñ	par	
waqt	bāñdha	huwa	farz	hai.

arabicText: وَلَا تَهِنُوا۟ فِى ٱبْتِغَآءِ ٱلْقَوْمِ ۖ إِن تَكُونُوا۟ تَأْلَمُونَ فَإِنَّهُمْ يَأْلَمُونَ كَمَا تَأْلَمُونَ ۖ وَتَرْجُونَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَرْجُونَ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 kāfiroñ	 ki	 talash	 meiñ	 susti	 na	 karo	 agar	 tumheiñ	 dukh	 pahuñchta	 hai	 jaisa	 tumheiñ	
pahuñchta	 hai	aur	 tum	Allah	 se	woh	 ummeed	 rakhte	 ho	jo	woh	 nahi	 rakhte	aur	Allah	jān-ne	
wāla	hikmat	wāla	hai.

arabicText: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِٱلْحَقِّ لِتَحْكُمَ بَيْنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِمَآ أَرَىٰكَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَلَا تَكُن لِّلْخَآئِنِينَ خَصِيمًۭا
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Mehboob!	Beshak	ham	ne	tumhāri	taraf	sachchi	Kitāb	utāri	ke	tum	logoñ	meiñ	faisla	karo	jis	
tarah	tumheiñ	Allah	dikhāye	aur	dghā	wāloñ	ki	taraf	se	na	jhagdo.

arabicText: وَٱسْتَغْفِرِ ٱللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورًۭا رَّحِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 seek	 forgiveness	 from	 Allah;	 indeed	
Allah is	Oft	Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Allah	 se	 mu'āfi	 chāho	 beshak	 Allah	
bakhsh	ne	wāla	maherbān	hai.

arabicText: وَلَا تُجَـٰدِلْ عَنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْتَانُونَ أَنفُسَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ مَن كَانَ خَوَّانًا أَثِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	do	not	plead	 on	 behalf	 of	 those	who	
deceive	themselves;	indeed	Allah does	not	
like	any	treacherous,	excessive	sinner.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	ki	taraf	se	na	jhagdo	jo	apni	jānoñ	
ko	khiyānat	meiñ	dālte	haiñ	beshak	Allah		
nahi	chāhta	kisi	bade	dghā-bāz	guneh-gār	
ko

arabicText: يَسْتَخْفُونَ مِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَا يَسْتَخْفُونَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ وَهُوَ مَعَهُمْ إِذْ يُبَيِّتُونَ مَا لَا يَرْضَىٰ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْلِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا يَعْمَلُونَ مُحِيطًا
englishTranslationText:
They	hide	from	men	and	do	not	hide	from	
Allah,	 whereas	 Allah is	 with	 them	 when	
they	 plan	 in	 their	 hearts	 that	 which	
displeases	Him;	and	Allah has	their	deeds	
encompassed.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ādmiyoñ	se	chupte	haiñ	aur	Allah	se	nahi	
chupte	aur	Allah	unke	pās	hai	jab	dil	meiñ	
woh	bāt	tajweez	karte	haiñ	jo	Allah	ko	napasand	 hai	 aur	 Allah	 unke	 kāmoñ	 ko	
ghere	huwe	hai

arabicText: هَـٰٓأَنتُمْ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ جَـٰدَلْتُمْ عَنْهُمْ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا فَمَن يُجَـٰدِلُ ٱللَّهَ عَنْهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ أَم مَّن يَكُونُ عَلَيْهِمْ وَكِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
. Pay	heed!	It	is	you	people	who	argued	on	
their	 behalf	 in	 the	 life	 of	 this	 world;	 so	
who	 will	 fight	 on	 their	 behalf	 with	 Allah
on	the	Day	of	Resurrection,	or	who	will	be	
their	pleader?
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Sunte	ho	yeh	jo	 tum	ho	duniyā	ki	zindagi	
meiñ	to	unki	taraf	se	jhagde	to	un	ki	taraf	
se	kaun	jhagde	ga	Allah	se	Qayāmat	ke	din	
ya	kaun	unka	wakeel	hoga.

arabicText: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ سُوٓءًا أَوْ يَظْلِمْ نَفْسَهُۥ ثُمَّ يَسْتَغْفِرِ ٱللَّهَ يَجِدِ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورًۭا رَّحِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	whoever	does	evil	or	wrongs	his	own	
soul	 and	 then	 seeks	 forgiveness	 from	
Allah,	 will	 find	 Allah Oft	 Forgiving,	 Most	
Merciful
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jo	 koi	 burāyi	 ya	 apni	 jān	 par	 zulm	
kare	phir	Allah	se	bakhshish	chāhe	to	Allah	ko	bakhsh	ne	wāla	maherbān	pāyega

arabicText: وَمَن يَكْسِبْ إِثْمًۭا فَإِنَّمَا يَكْسِبُهُۥ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِۦ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
. And	 whoever	 earns	 sin,	 his	 earnings	 will	
only	 be	 against	 himself;	 and	 Allah is	 the	
Knowing,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText: aur	jo	gunāh	kamāye	to	uski	kamāyi	usi	ki	jān	par	pade	aur	Allah	Ilm-o-Hikmat	wāla	hai

arabicText: وَمَن يَكْسِبْ خَطِيٓـَٔةً أَوْ إِثْمًۭا ثُمَّ يَرْمِ بِهِۦ بَرِيٓـًۭٔا فَقَدِ ٱحْتَمَلَ بُهْتَـٰنًۭا وَإِثْمًۭا مُّبِينًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	whoever	commits	a	mistake	or	a	sin,	
then	 blames	 it	 on	 someone	 innocent	 has	
indeed	burdened	himself	with	infamy	and	a	manifest	crime.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jo	koi	khtā	ya	gunāh	kamāye	phir	usey	kisi	be-gunāh	par	thop	de	usne	zaroor	bohtān	aur	
khulā	gunāh	uthāya

arabicText: وَلَوْلَا فَضْلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكَ وَرَحْمَتُهُۥ لَهَمَّت طَّآئِفَةٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُضِلُّوكَ وَمَا يُضِلُّونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمْ ۖ وَمَا يَضُرُّونَكَ مِن شَىْءٍۢ ۚ وَأَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَعَلَّمَكَ مَا لَمْ تَكُن تَعْلَمُ ۚ وَكَانَ فَضْلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكَ عَظِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 O	 dear	 Prophet,	 were	 it	 not	 for	 Allah’s	 munificence	 and	 His	 mercy	 upon	 you,	 a	 group	
among	them	would	have	wished	to	deceive	you;	and	they	only	mislead	themselves	and	will	not	
harm	you	at	all;	and	Allah has	sent	down	upon	you	 the	Book	and	wisdom,	and	 taught	you	all	
what	you	did	not	know*;	and	upon	you	is	Allah’s	great	munificence.	(Allah gave	the	knowledge	
of	the	hidden	to	the	Holy	Prophet	– peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 aey	Mehboob!	Agar	 Allah	 ka	Fazl-o-Rahmat	 tum	 par	 na	 hota	 to	 un	meiñ	 ke	 kuch log	 yeh	
chāhte	ke	tumheiñ	dhoka	de	deiñ	aur	woh	apne	hi	āp	ko	behka	rahe	haiñ	aur	tumhāra	kuch	na	
bigādeñ	ge	aur	Allah	ne	tum	par	Kitāb	aur	Hikmat	utāri	aur	tumheiñ	sikha	diya	jo	kuch	tum	na	
jānte	they	aur	Allah	ka	tum	par	badā	fazl	hai.

arabicText: ۞ لَّا خَيْرَ فِى كَثِيرٍۢ مِّن نَّجْوَىٰهُمْ إِلَّا مَنْ أَمَرَ بِصَدَقَةٍ أَوْ مَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ إِصْلَـٰحٍۭ بَيْنَ ٱلنَّاسِ ۚ وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ ٱبْتِغَآءَ مَرْضَاتِ ٱللَّهِ فَسَوْفَ نُؤْتِيهِ أَجْرًا عَظِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Most	 of	 their	 discussions	 do	 not	 contain	
any	 good,	 except	 of	 the	 one	 who	 enjoins	
charity	 or	 goodness	 or	 peace-making	
among	people;	whoever	does	that	to	seek	
the	pleasure	of	Allah - We	shall	soon	give	
him	a	great	reward
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unke	aksar	mashwaroñ	meiñ	kuch	bhalāi	
nahi	magar	jo	hukm	de	khairāt	 ya	achchi	
bāt	 ya	 logoñ	 meiñ	 sulāh	 karne	 ka	 aur	 jo	
Allah	ki	raza	chāhne	ko	aisa	kare	usey	anqareeb	ham	badā	sawāb	deñge

arabicText: وَمَن يُشَاقِقِ ٱلرَّسُولَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُ ٱلْهُدَىٰ وَيَتَّبِعْ غَيْرَ سَبِيلِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ نُوَلِّهِۦ مَا تَوَلَّىٰ وَنُصْلِهِۦ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ وَسَآءَتْ مَصِيرًا
englishTranslationText:
And	 whoever	 opposes	 the	 Noble	
Messenger	 after	 the	 right	 path	 has	 been	
made	 clear	 to	 him,	 and	 follows	 a	 way	
other	 than	 that	 of	 the	 Muslims,	We	 shall	
leave	him	as	he	is,	and	put	him	in	hell;	and	
what	a	wretched	place	to	return!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jo	Rasool	 ka	 khilāf	 kare	b'ad	iske	 ke	
haq	 rāsta	 us	 par	 khul	 chukā	 aur	
Musalmānoñ	ki	rāh	se	judā	rāh	chale	ham	
usey	 us	 ke	 hāl	 par	 chord	 deñge	 aur	 usey	
dozakh	 meiñ	 dākhil	 kareñge	 aur	 kiya	 hi	
buri	jagah	palatne	ki

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَغْفِرُ أَن يُشْرَكَ بِهِۦ وَيَغْفِرُ مَا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَن يُشْرِكْ بِٱللَّهِ فَقَدْ ضَلَّ ضَلَـٰلًۢا بَعِيدًا
englishTranslationText:
Allah does	 not	 forgive	 (the	 greatest	 sin)	
that	partners	be	ascribed	with	Him	- and	
He	forgives	all	that	is	below	(lesser	sins)	it,	
to	 whomever	 He	 wills;	 and	 whoever	
ascribes	 partners	 with	 Allah has	 indeed	
wandered	far	astray
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Allah	 usey	 nahi	 bakhshtā	 ke	 uskā	 koi	
shareek	thahrāya	jāye	aur	us	se	neeche	jo	
kuch hai	 jise	 chāhe	mu'āf	 farmā	 detā	 hai	
aur	 jo	 Allah	 ka	 shareek	 thahrāye	 woh	
door	ki	gumrāhi	meiñ	padā.

arabicText: إِن يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ إِنَـٰثًۭا وَإِن يَدْعُونَ إِلَّا شَيْطَـٰنًۭا مَّرِيدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
The	 polytheists	 do	 not	 worship	 Allah,	
except	 some	 females;	 and	 they	 do	 not	
worship	 anyone	 except	 the	 rebellious	
Satan.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	 shirk	wāle	Allah	 ke	 siwa	 nahi	 poojte	
magar	 kuch	 aurtoñ	 ko	 aur	 nahi	 poojte	
magar	sarkash	shaitān	ko.

arabicText: لَّعَنَهُ ٱللَّهُ ۘ وَقَالَ لَأَتَّخِذَنَّ مِنْ عِبَادِكَ نَصِيبًۭا مَّفْرُوضًۭا
englishTranslationText:
The	 one	whom	Allah has	cursed;	and	 the	
devil	said,	“I	swear,	I	will	certainly	take	an	
appointed	portion	of	Your	bondmen,”	-
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jis	 par	 Allah	 ne	 la'nat	 ki	 aur	 bolā	 qasam	
hai	maiñ	zaroor	tere	bandoñ	meiñ	se	kuch	
thahrāya	hua	hissa	looñga.

arabicText: لَّعَنَهُ ٱللَّهُ ۘ وَقَالَ لَأَتَّخِذَنَّ مِنْ عِبَادِكَ نَصِيبًۭا مَّفْرُوضًۭا
englishTranslationText:
The	 one	whom	Allah has	cursed;	and	 the	
devil	said,	“I	swear,	I	will	certainly	take	an	
appointed	portion	of	Your	bondmen,”	-
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jis	 par	 Allah	 ne	 la'nat	 ki	 aur	 bolā	 qasam	
hai	maiñ	zaroor	tere	bandoñ	meiñ	se	kuch	
thahrāya	hua	hissa	looñga.

arabicText: وَلَأُضِلَّنَّهُمْ وَلَأُمَنِّيَنَّهُمْ وَلَـَٔامُرَنَّهُمْ فَلَيُبَتِّكُنَّ ءَاذَانَ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ وَلَـَٔامُرَنَّهُمْ فَلَيُغَيِّرُنَّ خَلْقَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَمَن يَتَّخِذِ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ وَلِيًّۭا مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَقَدْ خَسِرَ خُسْرَانًۭا مُّبِينًۭا
englishTranslationText:
. “And	 I	 will	 surely	 lead	 them	 astray,	 and	 I	 will	 certainly	 arouse	 desires	 in	 them,	 and	 I	 will	
definitely	order	them	so	they	will	pierce	animals’	ears,	and	I	will	definitely	order	them	so	they	
will	 alter	 Allah’s	 creation”;	 and	 whoever	 chooses	 the	 devil	 for	 a	 friend	 instead	 of	 Allah,	 has	
indeed	suffered	a	manifest	loss.	-
romanUrduTranslationText:
Qasam	hai	maiñ	zaroor	unheiñ	dikha	duñga	aur	zaroor	unheiñ	ārzūyeiñ	dilāuñ	ga	aur	zaroor	
unheiñ	kahuñ	ga	ke	woh	chaupāyoñ	ke	kān	cheereñge	aur	zaroor	unheiñ	kahuñ	ga	ke	woh	Allah	
ki	paida	 ki	huwi	cheezeiñ	badal	deñge	aur	jo	Allah	 ko	chord	 kar	 shaitān	 ko	dost	banāye	woh	
sareeh	tote	(Khule	Nuqsān)	meiñ	padā

arabicText: يَعِدُهُمْ وَيُمَنِّيهِمْ ۖ وَمَا يَعِدُهُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ إِلَّا غُرُورًا
englishTranslationText:
The	 devil	 promises	 them	 and	 arouses	 desires	 in	 them;	 and	 the	 devil	 does	 not	 give	 them	
promises	except	of	deceit
romanUrduTranslationText:
Shaitān	 unheiñ	wa’āde	 deta	 hai	 aur	 ārzūyeiñ	 dilāta	 hai	 aur	 shaitān	 unheiñ	wa’āde nahi	 deta	
magar	fareb	ke.

arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ مَأْوَىٰهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ عَنْهَا مَحِيصًۭا
englishTranslationText: The	destination	for	such	is	hell;	they	will	not	find	any	refuge	from	it.
romanUrduTranslationText: Unka	thikāna	dozakh	hai	us	se	bachne	ki	jagah	na	pāyeñ	ge.

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ سَنُدْخِلُهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًۭا ۖ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقًّۭا ۚ وَمَنْ أَصْدَقُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ قِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 those	 who	 believed	 and	 did	 good	
deeds	 - We	 shall	 soon	 admit	 them	 into	
Gardens	 beneath	 which	 rivers	 flow,	
abiding	in	 them	 for	ever	and	ever;	a	 true	
promise	 from	 Allah;	 and	 whose	 Words	
are	more	 true	 than	 those	of	Allah?	(Allah
does	not	lie.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jo	 Imān	 lāye	 aur	 achche	 kām	 kiye	
kuch der	 jāti	 hai	 ke	 ham	 unheiñ	 bāghoñ	
meiñ	 le	 jāyeñ	 ge	 jinke	 neeche	 nahreiñ	
baheiñ	hamesha	hamesha	un	meiñ	raheiñ	
Allah	 ka	 Sachcha	 Wa’āda aur	 Allah	 se	
ziyāda	kis	ki	bāt	Sachchi?

arabicText: لَّيْسَ بِأَمَانِيِّكُمْ وَلَآ أَمَانِىِّ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ۗ مَن يَعْمَلْ سُوٓءًۭا يُجْزَ بِهِۦ وَلَا يَجِدْ لَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيًّۭا وَلَا نَصِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
The	affair	does	not	rest	on	your	thoughts,	
nor	 the	 cravings	 of	 the	 People	 given	 the	
Book(s);	whoever	does	wrong	will	get	the	
recompense	of	it	- and	will	not	find,	other	
than	Allah,	any	friend	or	any	supporter.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kām	 na	 kuch	 tumhāre	 khāyāloñ	 par	 hai	
aur	na	Kitāb	wāloñ	ki	hawas	par	jo	burāi	
karega	 us	 ka	 badla	 pāyega	 aur	 Allah	 ke	
siwa	 na	 koi	 apna	 himāyati	 pāyega	 na	
madad-gār

arabicText: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ مِن ذَكَرٍ أَوْ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌۭ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يَدْخُلُونَ ٱلْجَنَّةَ وَلَا يُظْلَمُونَ نَقِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	whoever	does	some	good	deeds,	be	it	
a	man	or	woman,	and	is	a	Muslim,	will	be	
admitted	to	Paradise	and	they	will	not	be	
wronged	 even	 to	 the	 extent	 of	 one	
sesame
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jo	kuch	bhale	kām	karega	mard	ho	ya	
aurat	 aur	 ho	 Musalman	 to	 woh	 Jannat	
meiñ	 dākhil	 kiye	 jāyeñ	 ge	 aur	 unheiñ	 til	
bhar	nuqsān	na	diya	jāyega

arabicText: وَمَنْ أَحْسَنُ دِينًۭا مِّمَّنْ أَسْلَمَ وَجْهَهُۥ لِلَّهِ وَهُوَ مُحْسِنٌۭ وَٱتَّبَعَ مِلَّةَ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ حَنِيفًۭا ۗ وَٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ خَلِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 whose	 religion	 is	 better	 than	 one	
who	 submits	 his	 self	 to	 Allah and	 is	
virtuous	 and	 follows	 the	 religion	 of	
Ibrahim,	 who	 was	 far	 removed	 from	 all	
falsehood?	 And	 Allah made	 Ibrahim	 His	
close	friend
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 us	 se	 behtar	 kiska	 Deen	 jis	 ne	 apna	
muñh	 Allah	 ke	 liye	 jhukā	 diya	 aur	 woh	
neki	 wāla	 hai	 aur	Ibrāheem ke	Deen	 par	
chala	jo	har	bātil	se	juda	tha	aur	Allah	ne	
Ibrāheem ko	apna	gehrā	dost	banāya.

arabicText: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ مُّحِيطًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 to	Allah only	belongs	all	whatever	is	
in	 the	 heavens	and	all	whatever	is	in	 the	
earth;	 and	 Allah has	 control	 over	 all	
things
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	hi	ka	hai	jo	kuch	āsmānoñ	meiñ	
hai	 aur	 jo	 kuch	 zameen	 meiñ	 aur	 har	
cheez	par	Allah	ka	qābu	hai.

arabicText: وَيَسْتَفْتُونَكَ فِى ٱلنِّسَآءِ ۖ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يُفْتِيكُمْ فِيهِنَّ وَمَا يُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ فِى يَتَـٰمَى ٱلنِّسَآءِ ٱلَّـٰتِى لَا تُؤْتُونَهُنَّ مَا كُتِبَ لَهُنَّ وَتَرْغَبُونَ أَن تَنكِحُوهُنَّ وَٱلْمُسْتَضْعَفِينَ مِنَ ٱلْوِلْدَٰنِ وَأَن تَقُومُوا۟ لِلْيَتَـٰمَىٰ بِٱلْقِسْطِ ۚ وَمَا تَفْعَلُوا۟ مِنْ خَيْرٍۢ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِهِۦ عَلِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	they	ask	you	the	decree	concerning	women;	say,	“Allah gives	you	a	decree	concerning	them	
- and	what	is	 recited	 to	 you	 from	 the	Qur’an	concerning	orphan	girls,	 that	 you	are	not	giving	
them	which	is	 ordained	 for	 them,	 and	 you	 are	 avoiding	marrying	 them	- and	 concerning	 the	
weak	 children,	and	 that	 you	must	 firmly	establish	justice	in	 dealing	with	 the	 orphans’	 rights;	
and	whatever	good	deeds	you	do,	then	Allah is	Well	Aware	of	it.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	tum	se	aurtoñ	ke	bāre	meiñ	fatwa	poochhte	haiñ	tum	farmādo	ke	Allah	tumheiñ	unka	fatwā	
deta	hai	aur	woh	jo	 tum	par	Qur'ān	meiñ	padhā	jāta	hai	un	yateem	ladkiyoñ	ke	bāre	meiñ	ke	
tum	unheiñ	nahi	dete	jo	un	ka	muqarrar	hai	aur	unheiñ	nikāh	meiñ	bhi	lāne	se	muñh	pherte	ho	
aur	kamzor	bachchoñ	ke	bāre	meiñ	aur	yeh	ke	yateemoñ	ke	haq	meiñ	insāf	par	qāim	raho	aur	
tum	jo	bhalāi	karo	to	Allah	ko	uski	khabar	hai

arabicText: وَإِنِ ٱمْرَأَةٌ خَافَتْ مِنۢ بَعْلِهَا نُشُوزًا أَوْ إِعْرَاضًۭا فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَآ أَن يُصْلِحَا بَيْنَهُمَا صُلْحًۭا ۚ وَٱلصُّلْحُ خَيْرٌۭ ۗ وَأُحْضِرَتِ ٱلْأَنفُسُ ٱلشُّحَّ ۚ وَإِن تُحْسِنُوا۟ وَتَتَّقُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 if	 a	 woman	 fears	 ill	 treatment	 from	
her	husband	or	disinterest,	so	it	is	no	sin	
for	 them	 if	 they	 reach	 an	 agreement	 of	
peace	 between	 themselves;	 and	 peace	 is	
better;	and	 the	heart	is	 trapped	in	greed;	
and	 if	 you	 do	 good	 and	 practice	 piety,	
then	Allah is	Well	Aware	of	it.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 agar	 koi	 aurat	 apne	 shauhar	 ki	
ziyādati	 ya	 be-raghbati	 ka	 andesha	 kare	
to	un	par	gunāh	nahi	 ke	āpas	meiñ	sulāh	
kar	leiñ	aur	sulāh	khoob	hai	aur	dil	lālach	
ke	 phande	 meiñ	 haiñ	 aur	 agar	 tum	 neki	
aur	parhez-gāri	karo	to	Allah	ko	tumhāre	
kāmoñ	ki	khabar	hai

arabicText: وَلَن تَسْتَطِيعُوٓا۟ أَن تَعْدِلُوا۟ بَيْنَ ٱلنِّسَآءِ وَلَوْ حَرَصْتُمْ ۖ فَلَا تَمِيلُوا۟ كُلَّ ٱلْمَيْلِ فَتَذَرُوهَا كَٱلْمُعَلَّقَةِ ۚ وَإِن تُصْلِحُوا۟ وَتَتَّقُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورًۭا رَّحِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	you	will	never	be	able	to	deal	equally	
between	women	however	much	you	may	
desire	 - therefore	 do	 not	 be	 totally	
inclined	 towards	one	leaving	 the	other	in	
uncertainty;	 and	 if	 you	 do	 good	 and	
practice	 piety,	 then	 (know	 that)	 Allah is	
Oft	Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	tum	se	hargiz	na	ho	sakega	ke	aurtoñ	
ko	barābar	rakho	aur	chāheiñ	kitni	hi	hirs	
karo	 to	 yeh	 to	 na	 ho	 ke	 ek	 taraf	 poora	
jhuk	 jāo	 ke	 doosri	 ko	 adhar	 (Darmiyān)	
meiñ	 latakti	 chord	 do	 aur	 agar	 tum	 neki	
aur	 parhez-gāri	 karo	 to	 beshak	 Allah	
bakhsh	ne	wāla	maherbān	hai.

arabicText: وَإِن يَتَفَرَّقَا يُغْنِ ٱللَّهُ كُلًّۭا مِّن سَعَتِهِۦ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعًا حَكِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 if	 the	 two	 separate,	Allah will	 make	
each	 one	 independent	 of	 the	 other,	 with	
His	Capability;	and	Allah is	Most	Capable,	
Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	tum	se	hargiz	na	ho	sakega	ke	aurtoñ	
ko	barābar	rakho	aur	chāheiñ	kitni	hi	hirs	
karo	 to	 yeh	 to	 na	 ho	 ke	 ek	 taraf	 poora	
jhuk	 jāo	 ke	 doosri	 ko	 adhar	 (Darmiyān)	
meiñ	 latakti	 chord	 do	 aur	 agar	 tum	 neki	
aur	 parhez-gāri	 karo	 to	 beshak	 Allah	
bakhsh	ne	wāla	maherbān	hai.

arabicText: وَإِن يَتَفَرَّقَا يُغْنِ ٱللَّهُ كُلًّۭا مِّن سَعَتِهِۦ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعًا حَكِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 if	 the	 two	 separate,	Allah will	 make	
each	 one	 independent	 of	 the	 other,	 with	
His	Capability;	and	Allah is	Most	Capable,	
Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	tum	se	hargiz	na	ho	sakega	ke	aurtoñ	
ko	barābar	rakho	aur	chāheiñ	kitni	hi	hirs	
karo	 to	 yeh	 to	 na	 ho	 ke	 ek	 taraf	 poora	
jhuk	 jāo	 ke	 doosri	 ko	 adhar	 (Darmiyān)	
meiñ	 latakti	 chord	 do	 aur	 agar	 tum	 neki	
aur	 parhez-gāri	 karo	 to	 beshak	 Allah	
bakhsh	ne	wāla	maherbān	hai.

arabicText: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَلَقَدْ وَصَّيْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ وَإِيَّاكُمْ أَنِ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۚ وَإِن تَكْفُرُوا۟ فَإِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَنِيًّا حَمِيدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
. And	 to	Allah only	belongs	all	whatever	is	
in	 the	 heavens	and	all	whatever	is	in	 the	
earth;	 and indeed	 We	 have	 commanded	
those	who	received	the	Books	before	you,	
and	 commanded	 you,	 that	 keep	 fearing	
Allah;	 and	if	 you	 disbelieve,	 undoubtedly	
to	 Allah only	 belongs	 all	 whatever	 is	 in	
the	 heavens	 and	 all	 whatever	 is	 in	 the	
earth;	 and	 Allah is	 Independent,	 Worthy	
Of	All	Praise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	hi	ka	hai	jo	kuch	āsmānoñ	meiñ	
hai	aur	jo	kuchh	zameen	meiñ	aur	beshak	
tākeed	farmā	di	hai	ham	ne	unse	jo	tum	se	
pahle	kitāb	diye	gaye	aur	tum	ko	ke	Allah	
se	darte	raho	aur	agar	kufr	karo	to	beshak	Allah	hi	ka	hai	jo	kuch	āsmānoñ	meiñ	hai	aur	jo	kuch	
zameen	meiñ	aur	Allah	be-niyāz	hai	sab	khoobiyoñ	wāla

arabicText: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلًا
englishTranslationText:
And	 to	Allah only	belongs	all	whatever	is	in	 the	heavens	and	all	whatever	is	in	 the	earth;	and	
Allah is	Sufficient	as	a	Trustee	(of	affairs).
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	Allah	hi	ka	hai	jo	kuch	āsmānoñ	meiñ	hai	aur	jo	kuch	zameen	meiñ	aur	Allah	kāfi	hai	kārsāz	(Kām	Banāne	Wāla).

arabicText: إِن يَشَأْ يُذْهِبْكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ وَيَأْتِ بِـَٔاخَرِينَ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ قَدِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText: O	people!	He	can	remove	you	and	bring	others,	if	He	wills;	and	Allah is	Able	to	do	that.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aey	logoñ	woh	chāhe	to	tumheiñ	le	jāye	aur	auroñ	ko	le	āye	aur	Allah	ko	iski	qudrat	hai

arabicText: مَّن كَانَ يُرِيدُ ثَوَابَ ٱلدُّنْيَا فَعِندَ ٱللَّهِ ثَوَابُ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Whoever	desires	 the	reward	of	 this	world,	 then	with	Allah only	lie	both	- the	rewards	of	 this	
world	and	of	the	Hereafter;	and	Allah is	All	Hearing,	All	Seeing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jo	Duniya	ka	in‘ām	chāhe	 to	Allah	hi	ke	pās	duniya-o-Ākhirat	donoñ	ka	in‘ām	hai	aur	Allah	hi	
sunta	dekhta	hai

arabicText: ۞ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ كُونُوا۟ قَوَّٰمِينَ بِٱلْقِسْطِ شُهَدَآءَ لِلَّهِ وَلَوْ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ أَوِ ٱلْوَٰلِدَيْنِ وَٱلْأَقْرَبِينَ ۚ إِن يَكُنْ غَنِيًّا أَوْ فَقِيرًۭا فَٱللَّهُ أَوْلَىٰ بِهِمَا ۖ فَلَا تَتَّبِعُوا۟ ٱلْهَوَىٰٓ أَن تَعْدِلُوا۟ ۚ وَإِن تَلْوُۥٓا۟ أَوْ تُعْرِضُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
. O	 People	 who	 Believe!	 Be	 firm	 in	
establishing	 justice,	 giving	 witness	 for	
Allah,	even	if	it	is	harmful	to	yourselves	or	
parents	or	relatives;	whether	the	one	you	
testify	 against	 is	 wealthy	 or	 poor,	 for	 in	
any	 case	Allah has	 the	greater	 right	 over	
it;	then	do	not	follow	your	wishes	for	you	
may	 stray	 from	 the	 truth;	 and	 if	 you	
distort	testimony	or	turn	away,	then	Allah
is	Well	Aware	of	your	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān	wālo!	Insāf	 par	 khoob	qāim	 ho	
jāo	 Allah	 ke	 liye	 gawāhi	 dete	 chāhe	 is	
meiñ	tumhāra	apna	nuqsān	ho	ya	mā	bāp	
ka	ya	risht-e-dāroñ	jis	par	gawāhi	do	woh	
ghani	 ho	 ya	 faqeer	 ho	 baher	 hāl	Allah	 ko	
iska	 sab	 se	 ziyāda	 ikhtiyār	 hai	 to	
khuwahish	 ke	 peeche	 na	 jāo	 ke	 haq	 se	
alag	pado	aur	agar	 tum	her-pher	 karo	 ya	
mooñh	phero	to	Allah	ko	tumhāre	kāmoñ	
ki	khabar	hai

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ ءَامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلَّذِى نَزَّلَ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ وَٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلَ مِن قَبْلُ ۚ وَمَن يَكْفُرْ بِٱللَّهِ وَمَلَـٰٓئِكَتِهِۦ وَكُتُبِهِۦ وَرُسُلِهِۦ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ فَقَدْ ضَلَّ ضَلَـٰلًۢا بَعِيدًا
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Have	faith	in	Allah
and	His	Noble	Messenger	and	the	Book	He	
has	sent	down	upon	this	Noble	Messenger	
of	His,	and	the	Book	He	sent	down	before;	
and	 whoever	 does	 not	 accept	 faith	 in	
Allah and	 His	 angels	 and	 His	 Books	 and	
His	 Noble	 Messengers	 and	 the	 Last	 Day,	
has	undoubtedly	wandered	far	astray
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān	 wālo!	 Imān	 rakho	 Allah	 aur	
Allah	 ke	 Rasool	 par	 aur	 us	 kitāb	 par	 jo	
apne	un	Rasool	par	utāri	aur	us	kitāb	par	
jo	 pahle	 utāri	 aur	 jo	 na	 māne	 Allah	 aur	
uske	 Farishtoñ	 aur	 kitāboñ	 aur	 Rasooloñ	
aur	 Qayāmat	 ko	 to	 woh	 zaroor	 door	 ki	
gumrāhi	meiñ	padā.

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ثُمَّ كَفَرُوا۟ ثُمَّ ءَامَنُوا۟ ثُمَّ كَفَرُوا۟ ثُمَّ ٱزْدَادُوا۟ كُفْرًۭا لَّمْ يَكُنِ ٱللَّهُ لِيَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ وَلَا لِيَهْدِيَهُمْ سَبِيلًۢا
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	those	who	believe,	then	disbelieve	
and	 then	 again	 believe,	 then	 again	
disbelieve,	 and	 go	 further	 in	 their	
disbelief	 - Allah will	 never	 forgive	 them,	
nor	ever	guide	them	to	the	path.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	 woh	 log	 jo	 Imān	 lāye	 phir	 kāfir	
huwe	phir	Imān	lāye	phir	kāfir	huwe	phir	
aur	 kufr	 meiñ	 badhe	 Allah	 hargiz	 Na	
unheiñ	bakhshe	na	unheiñ	rāh	dikhāye.

arabicText: بَشِّرِ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
englishTranslationText:
Give	 glad	 tidings	 to	 the	 hypocrites,	 that	
for	them	is	a	painful	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Khush	 khabri	 do	 munāfiqoñ	 ko ke	 un	 ke	
liye	dard-nāk	‘azāb	hai.
